00151   long long convertToTimeType(std::string date) {
00152 
00153       if(date.size()==0) {
00154         return 0;
00155       }
00156 
00157       boost::posix_time::ptime pt(time_from_string(date));
00158       boost::posix_time::ptime epoch(boost::gregorian::date(1970,1,1));
00159       time_duration::sec_type time = (pt - epoch).total_seconds();
00160 
00161     return (long long) time_t(time);
00162 
00163   }

00171   void checkUserId(std::string userId) {
00172     std::string sqlUserRequest = "SELECT userid from users where userid='"+userId+"'";
00173     boost::scoped_ptr<DatabaseResult> user(mdatabaseVishnu->getResult(sqlUserRequest.c_str()));
00174     if(user->getNbTuples()==0) {
00175        throw UMSVishnuException(ERRCODE_UNKNOWN_USERID);
00176     }

00237   void checkStatus(const int& status) {
00238      if((status < 0) || (status > 1)) {
00239        throw UMSVishnuException(ERRCODE_UNKNOWN_OPTION, "Invalid Status value: its value must be 0 or 1");
00240      }

00248   void checkClosePolicy(const int& closePolicy) {
00249       if((closePolicy < 0) || (closePolicy > 2)) {
00250          throw UMSVishnuException(ERRCODE_UNKNOWN_CLOSURE_MODE, "Invalid ClosePolicy value: its value must be 0, 1 or 2");
00251       }
00252   }
